sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react";
import { ListingContext } from "../Context";
import { Container, Row, Col, ListGroup, Card } from "react-bootstrap";
import placeholder from "../placeholder.png"

function MainContent() {
  const [listings, setListings] = useContext(ListingContext);
  return (
    <Container>
      <Row>
        <Col lg={3}>
          <ListGroup>
            <ListGroup.Item active>Category 1</ListGroup.Item>
            <ListGroup.Item>Category 2</ListGroup.Item>
            <ListGroup.Item>Category 3</ListGroup.Item>
          </ListGroup>
        </Col>
        <Col lg={9}>
          <Row>
            <Col lg={4} md={6} xs={4}>
              <Card style={{width: '18rem'}}>
                <Card.Img variant="top" src={placeholder} />
                <Card.Body>
                  <Card.Title>Item 1</Card.Title>
                  <Card.Text>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</Card.Text>
                </Card.Body>
              </Card>
            </Col>
          </Row>
        </Col>
      </Row>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default MainContent;
